items.title: Ugly "Cipheriv" warnings in log
items.body:
The task itself works fine, but allot of warnings are shown in the log due to a cipheriv issue.

```
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1681208Z ##[section]Starting: Pre Advanced Smoke Test
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1787576Z ==============================================================================
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1787853Z Task         : Advanced Smoke Test
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1788123Z Description  : Cross platform web smoke tests with header support, proxy support and retry option.
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1788366Z Version      : 0.1.5
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1788545Z Author       : Arne Petersen
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1788712Z Help         : 
2021-04-23T11:22:22.1788925Z ==============================================================================
2021-04-23T11:22:22.6814058Z Starting tests
2021-04-23T11:22:22.6818407Z testing url http://somefancyURL/bla/morebla
2021-04-23T11:22:22.6871785Z (node:2196) Warning: Use Cipheriv for counter mode of aes-256-ctr
2021-04-23T11:22:22.6872427Z (node:2196) Warning: Use Cipheriv for counter mode of aes-256-ctr
2021-04-23T11:22:22.6872868Z (node:2196) Warning: Use Cipheriv for counter mode of aes-256-ctr
```

**How to reproduce:**
Run the task :-)
